1.text: Learn the following rules and order of the game:

2.text: After dealing, the dealer takes the remaining deck and cuts it.

3.text: Starting with the player to the left of the dealer, players begin to bid how many tricks they can take.

4.text: The player to the left of the dealer plays first.

5.text: Once all cards have been played, the dealer tallies up the score.

6.text: The player to the left of the dealer deals the next round.

7.text: The game continues until the cards can no longer be divided equally among all the players, or until someone reaches a score of 100.
